_attachments.dfcf8c2345eb59b6bd2a97d3f3fb26e06384e1f0:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>New Form</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/EE1B3C3F-1F56-4CFF-AC17-0E940CDA319C" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="New Form">
					<question1 />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind nodeset="/data/question1" type="xsd:string" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="question1-label">
						<value>question1</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<input ref="/data/question1">
			<label ref="jr:itext('question1-label')" />
		</input>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
_attachments.e2a8d5278f67e88093d58ae2b8636ae8ead0ed39:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Register</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/08BD410C-7F70-49D0-8603-E4E9521CFFBB" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Register">
					<parent_name />
					<parent_age1 />
					<child_name />
					<child_age1 />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind nodeset="/data/parent_name" type="xsd:string" />
			<bind nodeset="/data/parent_age1" type="xsd:int" />
			<bind nodeset="/data/child_name" type="xsd:string" />
			<bind nodeset="/data/child_age1" type="xsd:int" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="parent_name-label">
						<value>Parent Name</value>
					</text>
					<text id="parent_age1-label">
						<value>Parent Age</value>
					</text>
					<text id="child_name-label">
						<value>Child Name</value>
					</text>
					<text id="child_age1-label">
						<value>Child Age</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<input ref="/data/parent_name">
			<label ref="jr:itext('parent_name-label')" />
		</input>
		<input ref="/data/parent_age1">
			<label ref="jr:itext('parent_age1-label')" />
		</input>
		<input ref="/data/child_name">
			<label ref="jr:itext('child_name-label')" />
		</input>
		<input ref="/data/child_age1">
			<label ref="jr:itext('child_age1-label')" />
		</input>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
_attachments.fff4f8c2d3a8f5fa57488def9f503f3edd2480cc:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>See Child</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/E9150118-F8F7-489E-92AF-8F739E7D2297" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="See Child">
					<nothing />
					<question4 />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind nodeset="/data/nothing" />
			<bind nodeset="/data/question4" type="xsd:string" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="nothing-label">
						<value>This form doesn't do anything</value>
					</text>
					<text id="question4-label">
						<value>question4</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<trigger ref="/data/nothing">
			<label ref="jr:itext('nothing-label')" />
		</trigger>
		<input ref="/data/question4">
			<label ref="jr:itext('question4-label')" />
		</input>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
_attachments.538d23121fba3a4a039fa1071ea9ecc6e4ab50e6:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Birth</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/9AE3F6A0-346C-4E70-BF22-F2DB6F1254F7" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Birth">
					<question1 />
					<child_name />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind nodeset="/data/question1" />
			<bind nodeset="/data/child_name" type="xsd:string" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="mother_alive-label">
						<value>Is the mother alive?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="question1-yes-label">
						<value>Yes</value>
					</text>
					<text id="question1-no-label">
						<value>No</value>
					</text>
					<text id="child_name-label">
						<value>Child Name</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<select1 ref="/data/question1">
			<label ref="jr:itext('mother_alive-label')" />
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('question1-yes-label')" />
				<value>yes</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('question1-no-label')" />
				<value>no</value>
			</item>
		</select1>
		<input ref="/data/child_name">
			<label ref="jr:itext('child_name-label')" />
		</input>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
